metadata.title: CVE-2019-14882 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Moodle 3.7 to 3.7.3, 3.6 to 3.6.7, 3.5 to3.5.9 and earlier where an open redirect existed in the Lesson edit page.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
